sentences.sContent: However, this object lacks the methods needed for run-time role assignment and revocation.
sentences.sContent_eng: However, this object lacks the methods needed for run-time role assignment and revocation.
sentences.sCn: 不过，这个对象缺少运行时角色分配和撤销所需的方法。

sentences.sContent: Workaround: If this feature causes performance problems in your environment, the certificate revocation check can be disabled.
sentences.sContent_eng: Workaround: If this feature causes performance problems in your environment, the certificate revocation check can be disabled.
sentences.sCn: 处理：如果这个特性在您的环境出导致性能问题，可以关闭证书撤回的选项。

trans.tranOther: the act of revoking a law, decision, or agreement
